item.title: Should I be nice?
item.description: I got the following email. Subject: i have a question? Date: May 18, 2012 7:57:56 AM CDT how can i enter the data of QTL analysis. That was the whole thing. I presume that the writer wishes to use my R/qtl software. I could probably respond helpfully (for example, “See the sample data files and code at the R/qtl web site.”), but can’t I expect more from people seeking my help?
